hadiths.text: Abu Bishr said “I heard ‘Abbad bin ‘Shurahbil a man of us from Banu Ghubar. He narrated the reast of the tradition to the same effect.”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي ابْنِ السَّبِيلِ يَأْكُلُ مِنَ التَّمْرِ وَيَشْرَبُ مِنَ اللَّبَنِ إِذَا مَرَّ بِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding A Wayfarer Eating Dates And Drinking Milk He Passes By
